items.headline: Essential Adult learning principles for Training Design
objectives_summary: How to analyze your audience effectively to tailor your program to their expectations?

items.title: Prevention of Sexual Harassment at Workplace
items.headline: Know it to Prevent It!
objectives_summary: By taking this course you will have the knowledge of sexual harassment and may become expert help to stop sexual harassment around you. This course will empower you with the understanding of sexual harassment (definition), its menace in our surroundings (workplace), measures to counter such events, psychology behind, knowledge about Internal Complaints Committee, Law around Sexual Harassment (in Indian context) and steps by which you can keep a working environment healthy & safe.

items.title: Cross-Cultural Management Made Easy
items.headline: Simple cross-cultural training & competency building to deal with business people from around the world. All situations.
objectives_summary: Understanding of cultural differences in the world
Understanding of the differences in preferred leadership styles across countries
Understanding of the differences in management styles in different countries

items.title: Challenging inappropriate behaviour in the workplace
items.headline: How to recognise and deal with bullying and harassment at work
objectives_summary: why certain behaviours are inappropriate
what constitutes bullying and harassment and the damage it can cause to your organisation
the legal responsibilities of employers and employees with regards to bullying and harassment under the Equality Act 2010

items.title: Get your Dream Job in Germany! Course from HR professional
items.headline: Learn how to write the perfect application and to convince in the job interview. With examples in English and German.
objectives_summary: You will learn everything you need to know in order to get the job of your dreams in Germany!
Learn how to write the perfect cover letter and résumé according to German standards
Prepare yourself ideally for job interviews
